Name: autosomal dominant osteopetrosis 1
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance of generalized osteosclerosis that is most pronounced in the cranial vault

Name: autosomal dominant osteopetrosis 2
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance of sclerosis predominantly involving the spine

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 5
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in mutation in the OSTM1 gene on chromosome 6q21.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 8
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the SNX10 gene on chromosome 7p15.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 3
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the CA2 gene on chromosome 8q21.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 1
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the TCIRG1 gene on chromosome 11q13.2.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 2
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the TNFSF11 gene on chromosome 13q14.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 4
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the CLCN7 gene on chromosome 16p13.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 6
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of that has_material_basis_in mutation in the PLEKHM1 gene on chromosome 17q21.31.

Name: autosomal recessive osteopetrosis 7
Definition: An osteopetrosis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the TNFRSF11A gene on chromosome 18q21.
